data.actual_result: The URL is off screen, not allowing any changes to be made to the part that is off screen
data.expected_result: Long URLs should move to the next line by splitting
data.short_description: Long URLs can be cut off in the editor if preceded by a space on Android - DEVICE SPECIFIC
data.steps_to_repro: - Type a URL in the message box (e.g. <https://gist.github.com/jagrosh/ab4ea890b48e2f5b7747351c22431896>) - Precede it with whatever you want, aslong as there is a space directly before the URL
